name: DragRace[UnityCoursePrototype1]
description:
2 player drag race - spheres make you hop. Reach the end of the runway and you will jump much higher.

WASD - control left player

C - change view

Left/right/up/down - control right player

L - change view

This is my conclusion of Week 1 of Unity.com 's Summer Code Course 2020.
